artist: Manufacturer: Royal Crown Derby Porcelain Company., Derby, England, est. 1877
creditline: Gift of Joanne Undine Halsey in memory of Dr. Clyde A. Undine
description: yellow ground; white interior; silver, gold, red and blue decoration; two thin clusters of flowering branches; repeating decorative pattern around top
inscription:

on bottom, in gold: [1624 (underlined) / 357 / 2]
title: Vase
